originalText.text: This is not just a rescue, but a matchmaking service for pups. As adopters with small children and cats, our coordinator was careful to consider our needs. She set us up with dogs we liked without hesitation, but they didn’t fit our family when we met. The coordinator kept suggesting one particular dog, and it turns out that he was the best match!  She understood our needs better than we did and truly knew the personality of each pup. The foster parent was so kind and provided a care package of pups favorite treats when we picked up. I would definitely recommend Waldo’s!

originalText.text:
Waldo's Rescue and their foster community is really special in the city. I fostered several loving dogs plus adopted one of my own from Waldo's, and felt supported each step of the way. I've experienced their leadership to care deeply about the each rescue pup and are willing do anything it takes to ensure their health and safety. They have volunteers groups masterfully manage transports, adoptions, fosters, fundraising social media, and events!

Waldo's is a foster-only network, meaning there is no physical shelter for the dogs but rather a network of caring individual who  take them into their homes. Would highly recommend for anyone looking to adopt make a difference through fostering :)

originalText.text: I have fostered over 30 dogs with Waldo’s! This rescue is organized, honest, and does amazing work finding dogs their forever homes. We aim to save every dog we can from kill shelters, when they arrive in NYC they are shown nothing but love and happiness all around them. Our volunteers work hard day and night to make sure the dogs are safe & the fosters have every question answered. If you are looking to foster or adopt, can’t suggest this rescue enough!!

text.text: I have fostered over 30 dogs with Waldo’s! This rescue is organized, honest, and does amazing work finding dogs their forever homes. We aim to save every dog we can from kill shelters, when they arrive in NYC they are shown nothing but love and happiness all around them. Our volunteers work hard day and night to make sure the dogs are safe & the fosters have every question answered. If you are looking to foster or adopt, can’t suggest this rescue enough!!

originalText.text: I fostered 4 dogs with Waldo’s Rescue and adopted one from them! The adoption process was super easy and adopting a dog really changed my life for the better. Fostering is such a fulfilling experience as well, I was so happy to be able to make a difference in these pups lives even if it was just for a few weeks. I’m grateful I was able to help them find a home and give them a safe space to decompress from their trauma. I couldn’t recommend them more! Two of my friends have adopted dogs from Waldo’s as well :) Fostering is hard work but so worth it. These dogs deserve a second chance and I’m so glad Waldos was able to help me find my best friend and first pet ever at 25!

originalText.text: I decided to take a chance on fostering for Christmas since I had time off. It was by far one of the best volunteer experiences I have ever had. Being able to see the direct impact I had on my foster dog and witness the way that he progressed was so heartwarming. Waldo’s employees are so kind and understanding to fosters. Their compassion for animals is evident as they work around the clock to ensure the animals’ care. It is amazing what love and patience can do to some of the most deserving animals. Fostering also taught my niece a valuable lesson on why it’s important to rescue and foster. I gave this foster dog my whole heart so he could be the best version of himself for his new family. I already signed up to foster with Waldo again!
